mapper.select: SELECT ST.SIGN_TYPE_NAME , SI.SIGN_TITLE , EI.EMP_INFO_NAME , JI.JOB_INFO_NAME , TO_CHAR(SI.SIGN_WDAT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SIGN_WDAT , TO_CHAR(SI.SIGN_WDAT, 'hh:dd') AS SIGN_WHOUR , TO_CHAR(SI.SIGN_EDAT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SIGN_EDAT , TO_CHAR(SI.SIGN_EDAT, 'hh:dd') AS SIGN_EHOUR FROM SIGN SI JOIN EMP_INFO EI ON (EI.EMP_INFO_EMP_NO = SI.SIGN_EMP_CODE) JOIN JOB_INFO JI ON (JI.JOB_INFO_CODE = EI.EMP_INFO_JOB_CODE) JOIN SIGN_TYPE ST ON (ST.SIGN_TYPE_CODE = SI.SIGN_TYPE_CODE) WHERE SI.SIGN_EMP_CODE = '199207220001' ORDER BY SI.SIGN_CODE DESC
